summary: Completed comprehensive testing of PolluxKart frontend-backend integration. All 40 backend tests pass (100%). Frontend successfully loads products, categories, brands from backend API. Search debounce, sorting, and cart features working. Login API verified working via curl, though Playwright test didn't complete full login flow due to timing.
critical_code_review_comments: Test files were using os.environ.get('REACT_APP_BACKEND_URL') which was blank - fixed to have fallback URL
data-testid='wishlist-btn' appears twice (header and product page) - should use more specific testids to avoid ambiguity
Search debounce implementation using useRef timer is working correctly with 500ms delay
seed_data_creation: None - using existing seeded data (21 products, 6 categories, 20 brands)
context_for_next_testing_agent: All backend APIs working. Frontend integration with backend verified. Test files updated to use fallback BASE_URL for reliability. Pytest results at /app/test_reports/pytest/pytest_results_iter3.xml. Cart works for both authenticated and guest users (localStorage fallback).

store_page_products_api.details: GET /api/products returns paginated products (21 total), correctly displayed on store page

search_debounce.details: 500ms debounce working - search badge appears after typing with delay

product_page_api.details: GET /api/products/{id} works, product details displayed correctly

categories_brands_api.details: GET /api/products/categories returns 6 categories, GET /api/products/brands returns 20 brands

login_api.details: POST /api/auth/login with test@polluxkart.com/Test@123 returns valid JWT token

cart_integration.details: Add to cart works (toast shown '1x Premium Green Tea added to cart!'), cart page displays items correctly in INR

wishlist_api.details: Backend APIs tested - GET /api/wishlist, POST /api/wishlist/items all working with auth

mocked_apis.Razorpay: MOCKED - Payment integration uses mock order IDs when API keys not configured
mocked_apis.note: All primary APIs (auth, products, cart, wishlist) are REAL and connected to MongoDB
